snippet.title: Trailblazers Gameplay Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Rev your engines for high-speed racing ablaze with an explosion of colour!  This brand-new video for Trailblazers offers a deeper dive into the game’s exhilarating, second-to-second, cooperative racing gameplay. 

Trailblazers is a fresh new co-operative racing title with an innovative on-track game mechanic: paint the track, boost on your colour and work as a team to win!

Find out more: http://www.trailblazersgame.com/

Trailblazers, developed by Supergonk and published digitally by Rising Star Games, will be available globally from Spring 2018 across all major gaming platforms.

PS4 - Xbox One - Switch – PC

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RisingStarGames/
Twitter: https://www.instagram.com/risingstargames/
Instagram: https://twitter.com/risingstargames

https://www.risingstargames.com
